title: Bodybuilding - Old School (1988 Olympia documentary)
description:
This is a video from 1988 (Mr. Olympia time) with Tom Platz as the interviewer.  First time the wayins are made public on the bodybuilders and, Platz talks to many.  Alot of great info in it.

First person is Rich Gaspari and, the info rolls in from their.  Amazingly, Gas[pari talks about why he doesn't eat wheat before his contest and, the fact in '88 he mentons directly glutin and estrogen from wheat means it's been in the public for a longtime and, no one paid any attention to it (or they made sure not too many people knew of it).  

The info goes on from there and, a great amount of inside the minds of some of these people as well.

Tom Platz did a wonderful job and, was perfect for this documentary
